name: Lost In The Boreal
description:
Lost In The Boreal is a game about outdoor survival. You are stranded in the wilds of northern Canada in the 1800's. With no gun you must try to keep yourself alive long enough until someone finds you.

There are three different scenarios in the game and each starts you off in a different season. All of them have one thing in common though and you must try to stay alive by hunting and gathering enough food and water . You must also conserve your resources and keep warm and dry to stave off the harsh conditions.

The seasons will change as time passes by so you will have to adjust your activities in accordance to the weather and available food resources. Keep an eye on your body temperature and main health bars. Green bar indicates health, red bar is your nutrition , Blue bar your hydration and yellow bar your fatigue.  

There is a bonus version of the game made under the Ludum Dare 41 theme . In  Lost In the Boreal Amongst Robots version you must shoot robots to collect food enough to survive as there are no wild animals. Luckily you have a bow with 5 arrows to start off with.
